sn3.18:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho raja pasenadi kosalo bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn3.18:1.3: “idha mayham, bhante, rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
sn3.18:1.4: ‘svakkhato bhagavata dhammo, so ca kho kalyanamittassa kalyanasahayassa kalyanasampavankassa, no papamittassa no papasahayassa no papasampavankassa’”ti.
sn3.18:2.2: Svakkhato, maharaja, maya dhammo. So ca kho kalyanamittassa kalyanasahayassa kalyanasampavankassa, no papamittassa no papasahayassa no papasampavankassati.
sn3.18:3.1: Ekamidaham, maharaja, samayam sakkesu viharami nagarakam nama sakyanam nigamo.
sn3.18:3.2: Atha kho, maharaja, anando bhikkhu yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho, maharaja, anando bhikkhu mam etadavoca:
sn3.18:4.1: Evam vuttaham, maharaja, anandam bhikkhum etadavocam:
sn3.18:4.3: Sakalameva hidam, ananda, brahmacariyam—yadidam kalyanamittata kalyanasahayata kalyanasampavankata.
sn3.18:4.4: Kalyanamittassetam, ananda, bhikkhuno patikankham kalyanasahayassa kalyanasampavankassa ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavessati ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikarissati.
sn3.18:5.1: Kathanca, ananda, bhikkhu kalyanamitto kalyanasahayo kalyanasampavanko ariyam atthangikam maggam bhaveti, ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaroti?
sn3.18:5.2: Idhananda, bhikkhu sammaditthim bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim, sammasankappam bhaveti … sammavacam bhaveti … sammakammantam bhaveti … sammaajivam bhaveti … sammavayamam bhaveti … sammasatim bhaveti … sammasamadhim bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn3.18:5.3: Evam kho, ananda, bhikkhu kalyanamitto kalyanasahayo kalyanasampavanko ariyam atthangikam maggam bhaveti, ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaroti.
sn3.18:5.4: Tadaminapetam, ananda, pariyayena veditabbam yatha sakalamevidam brahmacariyam—yadidam kalyanamittata kalyanasahayata kalyanasampavankatati.
sn3.18:6.1: Mamanhi, ananda, kalyanamittam agamma jatidhamma satta jatiya parimuccanti, jaradhamma satta jaraya parimuccanti, byadhidhamma satta byadhito parimuccanti, maranadhamma satta maranena parimuccanti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasadhamma satta sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasehi parimuccanti.
sn3.18:6.2: Imina kho etam, ananda, pariyayena veditabbam yatha sakalamevidam brahmacariyam—yadidam kalyanamittata kalyanasahayata kalyanasampavankata’ti.
sn3.18:8.1: Kalyanamittassa te, maharaja, kalyanasahayassa kalyanasampavankassa ayam eko dhammo upanissaya vihatabbo—
sn3.18:9.1: Appamattassa te, maharaja, viharato appamadam upanissaya, itthagarassa anuyantassa evam bhavissati:
sn3.18:9.3: Handa mayampi appamatta viharama, appamadam upanissaya’ti.
sn3.18:10.1: Appamattassa te, maharaja, viharato appamadam upanissaya, khattiyanampi anuyantanam evam bhavissati:
sn3.18:10.3: Handa mayampi appamatta viharama, appamadam upanissaya’ti.
sn3.18:11.1: Appamattassa te, maharaja, viharato appamadam upanissaya, balakayassapi evam bhavissati:
sn3.18:11.3: Handa mayampi appamatta viharama, appamadam upanissaya’ti.
sn3.18:12.1: Appamattassa te, maharaja, viharato appamadam upanissaya, negamajanapadassapi evam bhavissati:
sn3.18:12.3: Handa mayampi appamatta viharama, appamadam upanissaya’ti?
sn3.18:13.1: Appamattassa te, maharaja, viharato appamadam upanissaya, attapi gutto rakkhito bhavissati—
sn3.18:13.2: itthagarampi guttam rakkhitam bhavissati, kosakotthagarampi guttam rakkhitam bhavissati”ti.
